subject: Explore codebase for fibonacci references and dependencies
description:
Research all fibonacci-related code across the codebase:
1. Read `src/utils/fibonacci.ts` to understand the current implementation
2. Read `tests/unit/utils/fibonacci.test.ts` to understand existing test coverage
3. Read `src/utils/index.ts` to understand barrel exports
4. Check for any other files that import or reference fibonacci utilities
5. Check git history for context on why the current implementation exists
6. Check `plans/completed/fibonacci-generator-rewrite/` for historical context
7. Update this task's metadata.relevant_documentation with all findings

This is a research-only task - do not make any code changes.

acceptance_criteria: All importers of fibonacci utilities identified

verification.expected: List of all files referencing fibonacci
